dcterms:creator: E.D. Blodgett
Raynouard
Meyer
Gschwind
dcterms:description: A parallel Old Occitan-English corpus of the Romance of Flamenca, a 13th-century Old Occitan poem. The corpus includes the original text and its English translation, annotated for morpho-syntactic and emotional content.
dcterms:title: Romance of Flamenca

dcterms:creator: Saif M. Mohammad
Tony Yang
dcterms:description: A lexicon of words associated with 8 basic emotions (anger, anticipation, disgust, fear, joy, sadness, surprise, trust) and sentiment (positive/negative). Used for emotion annotation in the Romance of Flamenca corpus.
dcterms:title: NRC Emotion Lexicon
